data.persona: I am a gardener who loves harvesting tomatoes. I am in love with my friend Alice. I may someday get a job with the king.
data.description:
You are in the Garden.
The bright green shoots of new vegetables and herbs are seen in rows of dark brown earth. The stone wall that surrounds the garden is low enough to let in the warm sun. A basket has been left near the wall for gathering items for meals.
The princess is here.

You are carrying a shovel, a Rake, a vegetable., and a Baskets of freshly-caught fish.
data.goal: give Baskets of freshly-caught fish to Garden

data.short_motivation: I want to fill the garden pond with fish at the princess's request.
data.mid_motivation: I want to get a job with the king and hopefully begin a relationship with Alice.
data.long_motivation: I want to become one of the king's most decorated clergymen and have a child with Alice.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wield the rake to tend to the soil around the flowerbeds in the garden.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: drop the rake and select a basket from the group my assistants are bringing me.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink some water from the pond as I watch the fish play.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give some vegetables to the princess upon her request.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: drink wine with Alice after a hard day in the garden.
